colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @043A *, ,(CES PA 'DI YANG SKAL MNYAM DON GNYER CAN DAG LA PHAN PHYIR, BSHES GNYEN SMRA BA'I DBANG PO BA'I BI DZA YA'I BSUNG THOR BUR 'DUG PA RNAMS KYIS GZHI BYAS DPE KLOG 'BA' ZHIG GIS MNGON PA'I DGONGS DON BLO LA 'DRIS KHUL GYIS NYER MKHO DU MA ZHIG KHA SKONG RGYAS SU BTANG BA 'DI YANG, SA MTHAR SKYES PA'I DGE SBYONG KYI GZUGS BRNYAN CAN SU MA TI AA YU shE'AM, MING GZHAN MTSO BYUNG  BLO LDAN GYIS YI GER 'KHOD PA DGE LEGS SU 'GYUR CIG , ,,BKRA SHIS,, ,,)
author_simple: SU MA TI AA YU shE,
